name: Tao Through Space and Time
description:
Control Tao, a young Elf with the gift of shapeshifting, who is going to meet the Doctor and Missy for a great adventure through various worlds that will lead her to develop her gift. Each success will unlock a shapeshift into a new animal! This game will take you to several worlds and introduce you to various characters already seen in my earlier AGS games.

English translation : Paolo
